label: 寿命経
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Bussetsu issai nyorai kongō jumyō darani kyō. Ninety fascicles. Regarded as a powerful protection against the ills of old age and other troubles. See De Visser 1935: 2.512-514; McCullough and McCullough 1980: 343. [仏説一切如来金剛寿命陀羅尼経]
